overview: Audrey and Marc are arriving in their new apartment. Everything looks good exept one detail : in front of the apartment, there is a sex-shop, which makes Audrey jealous. The worst soon happens when Marc meet Cindy, blond and pulpy, an employee of that famous store. Every evening, while Audrey is sleeping, Mark slips out of the apartment and goes to see the beautiful creature of his fantasies ...
title: Unknown Pleasures
